A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Didn't know \"Let the past die...\" meant \"Let everything you loved about the franchise die...\"\n\nWasted characters\, mishandled plot\, disregard for the previous films (including \"The Force Awakens\")\, and just an overall disappointing experience. Some cool scenes but then they wasted their meaning in favor of a politically charged subplot and romance that no one asked for.
